subject: Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Ryan Newman, winner of the Daytona 500, became the latest driver to be penalized by Nascar, losing 25 points because his car failed an inspection at Texas Motor Speedway. Newman’s No. 12 Dodge was too high when Nascar inspected it following its fourth-place run. Newman dropped to 10th place from eighth in the standings.
